title: Fly into the small airport: St Gallen Althenrhein airport (LSZR)
description:
St. Gallen Altenrhein Airport is a quaint facility located in Altenrhein, in the Canton of St. Gallen, Switzerland, close to Lake Constance. It serves as the home base for People's airline. The airport has been updated recently in MSFS, making it an excellent choice for those who enjoy flying to or from smaller airports.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
